description.en: Design rank card by your own

en.body:
{pn} [maincolor | subcolor | linecolor | progresscolor | alphasubcolor | textcolor | namecolor | expcolor | rankcolor | levelcolor | reset] <value>
   In which: 
  + maincolor | background <value>: main background of rank card
  + subcolor <value>: sub background
  + linecolor <value>: color of line between main and sub background
  + expbarcolor <value>: color of exp bar
  + progresscolor <value>: color of current exp bar
  + alphasubcolor <value>: opacity of sub background (from 0 -> 1)
  + textcolor <value>: color of text (hex color or rgba)
  + namecolor <value>: color of name
  + expcolor <value>: color of exp
  + rankcolor <value>: color of rank
  + levelcolor <value>: color of level
    ‚Ä¢ <value> can be hex color, rgb, rgba, gradient (each color is separated by space) or image url
    ‚Ä¢ If you want to use gradient, please enter many colors separated by space
   {pn} reset: reset all to default
   Example:
    {pn} maincolor #fff000
    {pn} subcolor rgba(255,136,86,0.4)
    {pn} reset

guide.vi:
{pn} [4 | 5 | 6] [single | multi]: t·∫°o m·ªôt b√†n ch∆°i m·ªõi, v·ªõi:
    4 5 6 l√† s·ªë ch·ªØ s·ªë c·ªßa s·ªë c·∫ßn ƒëo√°n, m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh l√† 4.
    single | multi l√† ch·∫ø ƒë·ªô ch∆°i, single l√† 1 ng∆∞·ªùi ch∆°i, multi l√† nhi·ªÅu ng∆∞·ªùi ch∆°i, m·∫∑c ƒë·ªãnh l√† single.
   V√≠ d·ª•:

   C√°ch ch∆°i: ng∆∞·ªùi ch∆°i tr·∫£ l·ªùi tin nh·∫Øn c·ªßa bot theo quy t·∫Øc sau:
   B·∫°n c√≥ 10 l·∫ßn (4 s·ªë), 12 l·∫ßn (5 s·ªë), 15 l·∫ßn (6 s·ªë).
   Sau m·ªói l·∫ßn ƒëo√°n, b·∫°n s·∫Ω nh·∫≠n ƒë∆∞·ª£c th√™m g·ª£i √Ω l√† s·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng ch·ªØ s·ªë ƒë√∫ng (hi·ªÉn th·ªã b√™n tr√°i) v√† s·ªë l∆∞·ª£ng ch·ªØ s·ªë ƒë√∫ng v·ªã tr√≠ (hi·ªÉn th·ªã b√™n ph·∫£i).
   L∆∞u √Ω: S·ªë ƒë∆∞·ª£c h√¨nh th√†nh v·ªõi c√°c ch·ªØ s·ªë t·ª´ 0 ƒë·∫øn 9, m·ªói ch·ªØ s·ªë xu·∫•t hi·ªán duy nh·∫•t m·ªôt l·∫ßn v√† s·ªë c√≥ th·ªÉ ƒë·ª©ng ƒë·∫ßu l√† 0.

   {pn} rank <trang>: xem b·∫£ng x·∫øp h·∫°ng.
   {pn} info [<uid> | <@tag> | <reply> | <ƒë·ªÉ tr·ªëng>]: xem th√¥ng tin x·∫øp h·∫°ng c·ªßa b·∫°n ho·∫∑c ng∆∞·ªùi kh√°c.
   {pn} reset: reset b·∫£ng x·∫øp h·∫°ng (ch·ªâ admin bot).
guide.en:
{pn} [4 | 5 | 6] [single | multi]: create a new game, with:
    4 5 6 is the number of digits of the number to guess, default is 4.
    single | multi is the game mode, single is 1 player, multi is multi player, default is single.
   Example:
    {pn}
    {pn} 4 single

   How to play: the player replies to the message of the bot with the following rules:
   You have 10 times (4 numbers), 12 times (5 numbers), 15 times (6 numbers).
   After each guess, you will get additional hints of the number of correct digits (shown on the left) and the number of correct digits (shown on the right).
   Note: The number is formed with digits from 0 to 9, each digit appears only once and the number can start with 0.

   {pn} rank <page>: view the ranking.
   {pn} info [<uid> | <@tag> | <reply> | <empty>]: view your or other's ranking information.
   {pn} reset: reset the ranking (only admin bot).
